game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to the village elder.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden somewhere in the nearby ruins. The village elder has asked you to retrieve it to bring back prosperity to their people.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.objective: Explore the ruins to find any clues about the artifact's location.
task.description: You need to thoroughly search the ancient ruins for any hints or symbols that might lead you to the artifact.

task.objective: Defeat the Guardian of the Temple.
task.description: A powerful guardian protects the temple where the artifact is believed to be kept. You must overcome this challenge to proceed.

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact and return it to Gilbert.
task.description: Once you have found the artifact, carefully collect it and bring it back to the village elder for your reward.
